sentences.en: Paracortical areas expanded with moderate size lymphoma cells with clear cytoplasm and irregular nuclei.
sentences.cn: 副皮质区随着中等大小的胞质清、核不规则的淋巴瘤细胞而扩大。

sentences.en: These additional tests are of immense importance un hematopathology and should be done whenever lymphoma is a possibility.
sentences.cn: 这些辅助检测在血液病理学极其重要，只要有淋巴瘤的可能就必须检测。
